item.title: A Command please help
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

I think this is what you wanted.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank") && c.absX > 3074 && c.absX < 3107 && c.absY > 3472 && c.absY < 3506)) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ", 2); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players; if(Server.playerHandler.players != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: A Command please help
item.dc:creator: @pk_evolution pk evolution
item.description:
@pk_evolution wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“dice”) && (c.isDonator == 1)) {
if(c.absX > 3074 && c.absX < 3107 && c.absY > 3472 && c.absY < 3506){

    c.forcedChat("I have rolled a "+ Misc.random(100) +" on the dice!");
    c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
    c.gfx0(2074);
    c.startAnimation(11900);

}else
c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>You can only dice at home.");
}

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ", 2);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) {
             						c.getPA().otherBank(c, o);
										break;
						}
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); 
				}
		}

Could you please make it so you can only checkbanks at home to prevent moderators being able to bank when playing the game by checking somones bank then click deposit and it will show up there bank.
I want it so they can only do the command at home like dice

Read full topic
